definition: anonymous (e.g. author, donor etc)
not to have/no/none/not/to lack/un-/-less
name/noun (part of speech)/place (e.g. among winners)/famous/classifier for people
see 月氏[Yue4 zhi1] and 閼氏|阏氏[yan1 zhi1]
clan name/maiden name

sentences.english: You know who Mr. X is?
This song was written by an anonymous author.
sentences.chinese: 这道歌是一位无名氏写的。

sentences.english: Or, as an anon put it while discussing targets yesterday
sentences.chinese: 或者，就像一名无名氏在昨天讨论目标时所说的那样。
